content: work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 30sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 5sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 5sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 35sts round 6 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 6sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 6sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 40sts round 7 or until work meets between the dolls legs when pinched in the centre ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join 40sts tip for a dress simply work more rounds of 40hdc before fastening off round 8 optional to neaten the edge slip_stitch loosely into each st around 40 sl sts fasten_off leaving a tail use the tail and a darning needle to sew up a couple of stitches on either side in the centre as pictured to form the legs hide loose ends ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ sandal make 2 sandal is made from the bottom up in joined rounds initially and then in row with final round worked to make the strap at the end of each round rounds 1-4 join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st from now on work 9hdc join as above 9sts round 2 ch1 work 2hdc into each st around join 18sts round 3 ch1 single_crochet into the back loop only of each st around join 18sts pause to place a marker into the 12th and 13th sts these will be used for the straps later on the next few row form the back of the sandal row 4 ch1 single_crochet into each of the first 6sts turn 6sts row 5 ch1 decrease single_crochet into each of the next 2sts decrease turn 4sts round 6 slip_stitch loosely into each of the 4sts across do not turn now we will make the strap ch5 not too loosely and not too tightly skip 5sts across the front of the sandal work decrease across the next 2sts these will be the two you placed a marker in earlier ch5 skip 5sts across the front of the sandal as before and join with a slip_stitch to the first slip_stitch in the round 4sl sts 1sc & two ch5 spaces fasten_off and hide loose ends ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ weebee dolls the little ones how tweeny compares… from left to right tweeny weebee pocket paige little weebee and wee weebee all of these dolls were made with worsted/no 4/aran weight yarn and a 3mm hook as you can see i designed tweeny weebee to be more humanly proportioned more clothing options will be available for tweeny soon ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i really hope you have enjoyed making your tweeny weebee doll please share your projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page and don t forget to add your project to ravelry
